name: places/ChIJwdbarr9YwokRbpf-ntzr6a8
formattedAddress: 220 E 78th St, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 220 E 78th St, New York, NY 10075-2018, USA

editorialSummary.text: Book & gift store focused on titles & items with addiction recovery, spirituality & wellness themes.

originalText.text: Very nice! I came here to get my grand-daughter a giftcard. After she told her friend she was going to get a special gift for her boyfriend at Victoria's Secret, I quickly realized it was not a nice bookstore. Then, I went here to get her an appropriate gift and it was an amazing environment!

originalText.text: Choices has been my main source for all of our 12 step coins and gifts well over 8 years now. Jay and his crew always make sure they handle every order with the utmost care and speed. Watching his shop grow and change over time has been a gift to witness. Thank you as ALWAYS to all of you. If you are ever in a clutch situation to get a gift for someone you care about in recovery then this is the place to go!!!

originalText.text: Wellness, recovery, spirituality and self-help bookstore, with tarot and psychic readings in the back. Good selection of books, crystals, candles and incense. Huge selection of AA & NA recovery medallions, cards and literature for folks celebrating milestones in recovery. This Upper East Side mainstay has been in business for over a quarter century, but was recently renovated and updated, and its peaceful, friendly vibe is welcoming to all.

originalText.text:
I discovered Choices when I lived in New York.

I've since moved to Texas and make it a priority to get to the store each time I visit. I stock up on greeting cards, books, etc.  They have the best selection of coins.

A few months ago, I went to the Houston Intergroup store to buy coins. Their selection was pitiful and the cashier was so nasty. (I won't be going back there)
I immediately called Choices and had the best coins delivered in days. And a very pleasant conversation with I believe it was one of the owners.

I can't say enough about the selection, the friendliness of the staff and overall experience at this establishment.

originalText.text:
I went to Choice Gift Shop yesterday to receive a tarot card reading, unfortunately I was extremely disappointed in my reading and the service provided from their "tarot & astrologer" reader.

I decided to give her two stars because she did apologize several times while performing my reading because she was "too generalized" and not providing any explanation or "in-depth" explanation on the cards she pulled for me.

I understand these readings can be hit or miss but I don't think $30 provided me with any type of service I was expecting and should have received.
